mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, COURSE, TERRAIN, POINT, APPROVAL, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, START_ADDRESS, END_ADDRESS, DISTANCE, QR, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, COMPANY_NUM FROM TBL_PROJECT

SELECT tp.NUM, tp.TITLE, tp.CONTENT, tp.COURSE, tp.TERRAIN, tp.POINT, tp.START_ADDRESS, tp.END_ADDRESS, tp.DISTANCE, tp.QR, tp.REGIST_DATE, tp.UPDATE_DATE, tp.STATUS , tp.COMPANY_NUM , tp.JJIM_COUNT , tp.PROJECT_DATE, tp.COMPANY_COMMENT, tp.SUMMARY, tc.NAME FROM TBL_PROJECT tp INNER JOIN TBL_COMPANY tc ON tp.COMPANY_NUM = tc.NUM WHERE tp.NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROJECT (NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, COURSE, TERRAIN, POINT, APPROVAL, START_ADDRESS, END_ADDRESS, DISTANCE, QR, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, COMPANY_NUM, JJIM_COUNT, PROJECT_DATE, COMPANY_COMMENT, SUMMARY) VALUES(SEQ_PROJECT.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{course}, #{terrain}, #{point}, '0', #{startAddress}, #{endAddress}, #{distance}, NULL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '1' , #{companyNum}, NULL, #{projectDate}, #{companyComment}, #{summary})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_PROJECT WHERE project_Date >= SYSDATE ORDER BY JJIM_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_PROJECT WHERE project_Date >= SYSDATE ORDER BY POINT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10

select * from( SELECT * FROM (SELECT PROJECT_NUM, COUNT(PROJECT_NUM) APPLYCOUNT FROM TBL_APPLY a GROUP BY a.PROJECT_NUM) a JOIN TBL_PROJECT p ON a.PROJECT_NUM = p.NUM WHERE project_Date >= SYSDATE ORDER BY APPLYCOUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=10
